posts.name: Top 10 ES6 Features every Web Developer must know
posts.text: This essay will give you a quick introduction to ES6. If you don’t know what is ES6, it’s a new JavaScript implementation.

comments.text: Cruel…..var { house, mouse} = No type optimization at all
I think you’re undervaluing the benefit of ‘let’ and ‘const’.
